title: Integrity Has No Bounds
description: For Mature Adult Audiences. Contains language and actions some may deem offensive. Contains extreme violence. Sexually explicit content. MF.In book two of the Lucifer’s Breed John Handy is overflowing with integrity and when trouble finds the woman he considers his—he goes out for blood. He isn’t overly concerned by how many men he has to mow down to find the man responsible. What he is certain of, is the bastard would pay—with his life.Stevie is way more than she appears to be, and has been attracted to the Neanderthal biker for years now. When she is put in danger, he shows his true colors to her. But would he stick around after everything comes out, that she had no answer for—only hope.
author: Ryder Dane
